Player History
Hit first career homerun on 6/21/1965, off Tony Cloninger (MIL)...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Pittsburgh on 9/14/1965...
Drafted in 8th round, 144th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1972...
Traded from St. Louis to Chicago (N) on 2/6/1972 (Going to STL: RF L. Roberts. Going to CHC: RF D. Gonzales)...
Injured on 8/26/1973 with a Broken Finger, out for 5-6 weeks...
Drafted in 6th round, 105th overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1975...
Injured on 7/25/1975 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Drafted in 1st round, 9th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1978...
Injured on 4/12/1979 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 5/29/1981 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1984, off Dan Spillner (LA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/18/1984, off Gary Nolan (CIN)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1987, hitting .565 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
